sentences.sContent: Jill gradually became aware of an awful smell.
sentences.sCn: 吉尔渐渐地闻到了一股难闻的气味。

sentences.sContent: ...most of the people had said they’d rather cut down gradually before quitting...
...The other cut down gradually over the course of two weeks...
...This behavior may have evolved as dogs gradually learned they could benefit from avoiding conflicts with humans...
...it has gradually evolved into a unique element of Chinese culture.As the national treasure...
...The author gradually improved his writing by avoiding fancy language...
...by gradually changing it and refining it until it does work...

trans.tranOther: slowly, over a long period of time
